ressets Ringyl was a town in Tressardon, long-destroyed by the midâ€“8 century DR.
Long overgrown, Tressets Ringyl was full of trees. Only forty buildings were visible over their treetops. There was a castle in the middle, the Ringyl.
The Ringyl sat inside a valley. It was east of Felmorel, and further east was the Moonshorn Tower.
Once governed by the bandit Tresset, Tressets Ringyl had been the seat of the short-lived kingdom of Tressardon that he declared. However, the kingdom just about died with him, surviving him by onluy a few days.
In the , Elminster Aumar, a Chosen of Mystra, crossed Tressets Ringyl while seeking Dasumia he found the streets strewn with bones, and much ruin. He also gave the Ringyl a cursory exploration before spending the night in a nearby hilltop. That sorceress was in fact the Dasumia he sought.
* Silent Antlers
